title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 112 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 112 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Praise ye the LORD. Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.
lineList.cn: 你们要赞美耶和华。敬畏耶和华，甚喜爱他命令的，这人便为有福。

lineList.en: His seed shall be mighty upon earth: the generation of the upright shall be blessed.
lineList.cn: 他的后裔在世必强盛。正直人的后代，必要蒙福。

lineList.en: Wealth and riches shall be in his house: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 他家中有货物，有钱财。他的公义存到永远。

lineList.en: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.
lineList.cn: 正直人在黑暗中，有光向他发现。他有恩惠，有怜悯，有公义。

lineList.en: A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth: he will guide his affairs with discretion.
lineList.cn: 施恩与人，借贷与人的，这人事情顺利。他被审判的时候，要诉明自己的冤。

lineList.en: Surely he shall not be moved for ever: the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance.
lineList.cn: 他永不动摇。义人被记念，直到永远。

lineList.en: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD.
lineList.cn: 他必不怕凶恶的信息。他心坚定，倚靠耶和华。

lineList.en: His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.
lineList.cn: 他心确定，总不惧怕，直到他看见敌人遭报。

lineList.en: He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor; his righteousness endureth for ever; his horn shall be exalted with honour.
lineList.cn: 他施舍钱财，周济贫穷。他的仁义存到永远。他的角必被高举，大有荣耀。

lineList.en: The wicked shall see it, and be grieved; he shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away: the desire of the wicked shall perish.
lineList.cn: 恶人看见便恼恨。必咬牙而消化。恶人的心愿，要归灭绝。
